Text: Dateks October InsiteSeptember Septembers terrorist attacks have taken a terrible toll in human lives and investor confidence As the nation heals now is not the time to lose sight of your goals or drift away from your preferred trading strategies Heres some historical perspective on why from The Motley Fool In The Aftermath of Tragedy Sound Trading Strategies Remain Appropriate msaspHBXXX The Learning Curve In this time of market challenge many investors are considering ways to take a more defensive stance with their portfolio For those unfamiliar these strategies can be both effective and easy to implement Learn more in SmartMoney Universitys Defense is the Best Offense Defense is the Best Offense msaspHBXXX Customer Corner If you never ask you can never learn Datek appreciates and responds to all the questions we receive from our customers Heres one that we think may be on the minds of many traders Real questions from our customersanswered by real folks in customer support
